text: Blind Musician () is a 1960 Soviet drama movie directed by Tatyana Lukashevich.Забытый классикВ Санкт-Петербурге показывают "Кино для всех" It stars Boris Livanov, Vasily Livanov, and Marina Strizhenova. == Actors == * Boris Livanov as Uncle Maxim Yatsenko * Vasily Livanov as Pyotr * Marina Strizhenova as Anna Mikhajlovna * Larisa Kurdymova as Evelina * Yury Puzyryov as Joachim * Alexey Gribov as Fyodor Kaniba == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Tatyana Lukashevich
title: Blind Musician
